item.description:
NEW LOCATION!!!

We're continuing in September with another of our famous Cashflow Meetups! ANY EXPERIENCE LEVEL IS WELCOME!! We always have some who have never played before as well as veterans. We will shoot for having a 202 board, but as always we reserve that board for those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least five times.


There is parking on Hemenway Street. Even though it says Fenway Resident, I have never gotten a ticket there. But if you do, you're on your own! If you have any trouble finding us, please feel free to call my cell (617-519-3163).

PLEASE BE ON TIME!!! We will start PROMPTLY at three.

We're looking forward to seeing you ALL there on Sunday September 6!

Russ
617-519-3163
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the lobby, in front of the Au Bon Pain
item.name: REGULAR Cashflow Meetup--NEW LOCATION!!
